songs.title: My Heart 2 You
songs.lyrics:
(Hook):
Hey where are you going?
Why are you leaving me by myself?
You said you would be there till the end

(Verse 1):
Look
Ya mad cuz I'm up now
Or are you mad cuz I hit a touchdown
Yes boy I miss u no time for question
If I told u I still luv ya you would just diss
I miss how you kissed it I missed how you loving
I miss all your touches but I know that you was bugging

(Hook):
Hey where are you going?
Why are you leaving me by myself?
You said you would be there till the end

(Verse 2) :
(?)
